title: ottissippi the truth about great lakes indian history and the gateway to the west
description: Sweeping History and Culture of the Anishinabe of Southeast Michigan, Michigan, SW Ontario and the Northwest Territory. The hidden Truth that has been inaccessible no in one volume!In-depth, solid, extraordinary research. Groundbreaking research clarifies and reveals complex history. A very important contribution to education and history. A reference Treasury! The Three Fires and many others tribes connected to The Great Lakes. Available in ebook with a searchable Table of Contents.
author: Cheryl L. Morgan
